About us

Meet the team behind Site Sentinel.

Who we are

We are a team of Computer Science majors from Purdue University, ranging from freshmen to juniors, united by our passion for leveraging technology to solve real-world problems. With a strong focus on AI, cloud computing, and software development, we bring diverse perspectives and skills to our projects.

Our Mission

Our goal is to create impactful solutions that improve safety and efficiency in industries. We aim to use cutting-edge AI and automation to address critical safety challenges in the workplace, ensuring a safer environment for workers.
